summary: This code sets up the LSP (Language Server Protocol) for Emacs, adding a workspace folder, disabling idle delay, and configuring completion-at-point functions. It also mentions that some features are not ready yet.

details.comment: This code sets up the LSP (Language Server Protocol) for Emacs, adding a workspace folder, disabling idle delay, and configuring completion-at-point functions. It also mentions that some features are not ready yet.
details.content:
; set the thing.
;(company)
(lsp)
(lsp-workspace-folders-add ".")
(setq lsp-idle-delay 0)
;(find-file "lsp.sh")
;(lsp)
;(setq completion-at-point-functions (cons lsp-completion-at-point '()))
;(next-line)
; not ready yet.
;(completion-at-point)
;(print lsp-completion--cache)
